title: Property Consultant
description:

Qualifications: Real Estate and Real Property expertise, Sales and Negotiation skills, Experience in providing training to clients, Strong analytical and problem\\-solving abilities, Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, commission\\-based up to 70%.

title: IT Sales Executive
description:
**About Us**

Mobishastra Technologies is a leading global provider of enterprise messaging, telecom solutions, and Whatsapp Business Solution . We empower businesses with innovative mobile communication solutions, ensuring seamless connectivity and customer engagement.

**Job Purpose**

The IT Sales Executive will be responsible for generating new business opportunities, managing client relationships, and achieving sales targets across the UAE market.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Identify, generate, and qualify new sales opportunities for IT solutions and WhatsApp Business solutions.
* Build and maintain relationships with prospective clients.
* Understand client requirements and present tailored solutions.
* Collaborate with the technical and marketing team to deliver solutions effectively.
* Negotiate contracts, close deals, and ensure timely collection of payments.
* Build and maintain strong, long\\-lasting customer relationships.
* Achieve monthly/quarterly sales targets and KPIs as defined by management.

**Requirements**

* Minimum 1 year of sales experience in telecom, IT, or enterprise messaging industry or similar preferred.
* Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
* Strong negotiation, communication, and presentation skills.
* Ability to build and maintain strong client relationships.
* Self\\-motivated, result\\-oriented, and able to work independently.
* Proficiency in MS Office and CRM tools.
* Freshers here are encouraged to apply (Must be Graduated locally from Dubai).
* Fluency in English (Arabic/Hindi/Urdu is a plus).

**What We Offer**

* Competitive salary with attractive commission structure.
* Opportunity to grow within a global telecom and messaging solutions provider.
* Opportunity to build a sales career.
* Job Location: Business Bay

Please share cv at hr@mobishastra.com

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent

Pay: AED2,500\\.00 \\- AED3,500\\.00 per month

Application Question(s):

* Are you graduated from UAE ?

Location:

* Dubai (Required)

title: Financial Advisor Female
description:
We need only **Telesales** As a Debt Management Executive with Telesales Experience Communications, you'll be responsible for reaching out to customers over the phone and helping them with their debt management needs. You'll use your excellent communication skills to explain our services, assist with debt restructuring, and guide customers towards finding the best solutions for their financial situations. It's a rewarding role where you get to make a positive impact on people's lives! A telecaller is **a company representative that contacts the existing or potential prospects with the intention of closing a sale**. Given the nature of their job, they ought to have excellent communication skills and the ability to inform and pursue the potential prospect.

Requirements \\-

· Proven experience as telesales representative or other sales

· Proven track record of successfully meeting sales quota preferably over the phone

· Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects

· Excellent knowledge of English

· Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

· Cool\\-tempered and able to handle rejection

· Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints

· Excellent phone and presentation skills

Job Role:

· Contacting potential or existing customers to inform them about the product or service.

· Closing sales deals over the phone and maintaining good customer relationships.

· Gathering data \\& generating leads.

· Capable of achieving the monthly target.

· Willing to go the “extra mile” to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales.

· Keeping records of calls and sales and noting helpful information.

· Manifesting excellent communication and presentation skills.

· Exhibiting confidence in presenting the products over the phone and maintaining customer relationships

· Addressing the queries about the services of the company and tactfully resolving the same.

Kindly note : Only candidates who fit the criteria above \\& hold similar experience will be contacted.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher

Pay: Up to AED3,000\\.00 per month

title: Travel Consultant + Social Media Executive
description:
Preference: Own visa / Dependent visa (Female candidates)

We are seeking an enthusiastic **Travel Consultant \\+ Social Media Executive** to join our team immediately. This role combines travel consulting with managing our online presence, making it perfect for someone eager to grow in both fields.

Key Responsibilities:

* Assist clients with travel inquiries and bookings
* Manage the **corporate website** and **social media platforms**
* Create engaging content for Instagram, WhatsApp, and other digital channels
* Support marketing campaigns and online promotions
* Contribute to video presentations and online branding (a plus)

Requirements:

* Languages: **English, Hindi \\& Malayalam** (spoken and written)
* Basic computer skills with proficiency in **MS Word, Excel, etc.**
* Familiar with social media and Google tools
* Creative, proactive, and willing to learn
* Ready to join immediately

Experience:

* **Not required** – Freshers are welcome!
* Training will be provided

What We Offer:

* Friendly and supportive work environment
* Career growth in **Travel \\& Tourism \\+ Social Media Management**
* Hands\\-on exposure to both travel consulting and digital marketing

Interested candidates can send their CV to **055 675 8550**

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

Pay: AED2,000\\.00 \\- AED3,000\\.00 per month
